Mulberry Trees for Sale

Section: Item Display

FOR SALE—300 white mulberry trees suitable for
transplanting.     S.BARROWS.

Brooklyn, March
20.                                      
33tf

Section: Featured Content

Above: A white mulberry tree (Morus alba) in Windsor Locks, Connecticut, June 14, 2022

Commentary

Sylvester Barrows (1801-1876) was a minister as well as a horticulturist. He had a distant relative, Ephraim P. Barrows Jr., who was a minister with connections to the New York City anti-slavery movement [Cole, Charles C. Jr. 1953. The Free Church Movement in New York City. New York History 34:3:284-297 (July 1953).]
